‘othelo’, ‘wanisiyo welennda’, ‘muhunu dekak’, ‘aananda jawanika’ aadi mathaka hitina natya rasaka wiwidha charitha rangapanna mata awasthawa labuna.ekakata ekak wenas me natya, me charitha mathak wenakota thawamath hithata loku prabodhayak danenawa.

shri lankiya kridakayangen balaporoththu wana mattame jathyanthara tharanga jayagrahana laba ganimata nohaki wime wagakima jathika sangam wisin dariya yuthu bawa shri lanka jathika olimpik kamituwe sabhapathi hemasiri farnandu pawasayi.shri lanka krida sanwardhana departhamenthuwa mul wi niwaradi thirana gena krida kshethraya salasumakata anuwa idiriyata gena ya yuthu bawath sabhapathiwaraya awadharanaya karayi.glasgo podu rajya mandaliya krida ulele di shri lanka kandayama dakwu dakshatha pilibanda sahimakata path wiya nohaki bawa pawasamin sabhapathiwaraya bibisi sandeshayata me bawa kiya sitiyeya.ratata gaurawayak genena se thama thamanta ayath kridawa diyunu mattamakata gena eeme wagakima shri lanka olimpik kamituwa thula sitina jathika sangam wisipaha sathu bawayi olimpik kamituwe sabhapathiwaraya kiya sitiye.jathyanthara tharangawalata sahabhagi wimen thama kridaka kridikawanta thawaduratath athdakim laba ganima sandaha awasthawa labena bawa jathika sangam pawasana namuth pasugiya kalaya pura sidu wuwa men rajaye mudal wiyadam kara thawa duratath athdakim pamanak laba ganima niwaradi nowana bawa hemasiri farnandu pawasuweya.dedahas dahatha wasare aasiyanu yowun krida ulela, hambanthota nagaraye pawathwimata awashya pahasukam ha salasum pilibanda aasiyanu olimpik kawunsilaya samaga sakachcha karamin sitina bawath shri lanka jathika olimpik kamituwe sabhapathi hemasiri farnandu wadi duratath bibisiyata kiya sitiyeya.
